FuncDef:
The capture drop-packet forward-normal enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are expected to be discarded during forwarding.
The undo capture drop-packet forward-normal enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are expected to be discarded during forwarding. The capture drop-packet forward-normal enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are expected to be discarded during forwarding. The undo capture drop-packet forward-normal enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are expected to be discarded during forwarding. By default, the packet loss visualization function for the packets that are expected to be discarded during forwarding is disabled.
